text: Discovery Home & Health is an Italian pay television channel owned by Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA. The channel originally launched as the Italian version of Discovery Civilization on 1 March 2010. The channel was relaunched as Discovery Home & Health on 5 November 2019. As of 2024, it is the only surviving feed of Discovery Home & Health in Europe. == Logos == file:Discovery Civilization logo.svg|1 March 2010-5 November 2019 file:Discovery H&H.png;|5 November 2019-6 December 2022 file: Discovery Home & Health logo.svg|6 December 2022-present Category:Television channels in Europe
title: Discovery Home & Health (Italian TV channel)
